summary: "Superman Returns" is a 2006 superhero movie directed by Bryan Singer, based on the DC Comics character. It's the last movie in the original Superman series and follows Superman as he comes back to Earth after five years. He finds out his love, Lois Lane, has moved on, and his enemy, Lex Luthor, is planning to kill him and change North America. The film stars Brandon Routh as Superman, Kate Bosworth as Lois, and Kevin Spacey as Lex. Though it made a lot of money, the studio was unhappy with the earnings and canceled plans for a sequel. The Superman series was later restarted with "Man of Steel" in 2013.
title: Superman Returns
